content: चमरः [चम्-अरच् <ls>Uṇ. 3. 31</ls>] A kind of deer. --रः, --रं A chowrie most usually made of the tail of Camara. --री {@--1@} A shoot, sprout (मंजरी). {@--2@} The female Camara; यस्याथर्युक्तं गिरिराजशब्दं कुर्वंति बालव्यजनैश्चप्तर्यः <ls>Ku. 1. 13</ls>, <ls n="Ku. 1.">48</ls>; <ls>Śi. 4. 60</ls>; <ls>Me. 53.</ls>
